FY25 Results and Dividend Recommendation:United Spirits announced its FY25 financial results onMay 20, 2025, showcasing a 12.4% YoY growth in Profit After Tax (PAT). The Board of Directors recommended a final dividend of INR 8.0 per share, subject to shareholder approval.

Q4 FY25 Performance:The company's Q4 FY25 performance was a key highlight, with standalone EBITDA growing by 39.5% YoY, driven by improved margins. Consolidated net sales value (NSV) for the quarter stood at ₹3,031 crore, an 8.9% YoY growth (underlying growth at 10.2%).

Consistent FY25 Growth:For FY25, United Spirits reported consolidated NSV of ₹12,069 crore (up 6.6% YoY) and an EBITDA of ₹2,243 crore (up 12.1% YoY).

Board Meeting for FY25 Results:A Board meeting was held onMay 20, 2025, to approve the audited financial results for the year ended March 31, 2025, and recommend the final dividend.

Interim Dividend Announcement:Prior to the final dividend, an interim dividend of ₹4.00 per share was announced onMarch 25, 2025, and became effective on April 3, 2025.

Acquisition of NAO Spirits:OnJune 20, 2025, United Spirits announced its decision to acquire a majority stake in NAO Spirits for ₹130 crore, further expanding its brand portfolio.

Property Sale in Mumbai:The company finalized the sale of a prime Mumbai property for ₹172 crore onMarch 31, 2025, a move that could potentially impact its financials.

Positive Stock Movement:United Spirits' share price saw positive movement onMay 21, 2025, following the announcement of its FY25 results, opening at ₹1,570.00, up from the previous close of ₹1,556.60.

Analyst Predictions:Analysts predicted strong Q4 performance for United Spirits aroundMay 19, 2025, suggesting positive expectations for the company's near-term outlook.
